format:
<style>
.button {
    text-align: center;
    font: normal 15px Arial;
    text-decoration: none;
    background-color: #097479;
    color: white;
    padding: 8px 10px;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 15px;
    box-shadow: 0 7px #999;
    transition: all 0.5s;
    cursor: pointer;
    margin:5px;
  }
 

  .button:hover
  {
   background-color: #0b8f95;
  }
  
  .button:active {
  background-color: #214a4c;
  box-shadow: 0 5px #666;
  transform: translateY(4px);
}

</style>

<script>
var value = {};
// or overwrite value in your callback function ...
this.scope.action = function() { return value; }
</script>

<md-button ng-click="send({payload:action()})" class="button">Resetea la base de datos</md-button>
